1.8.9.1.0.1: Launch spell now also launches any entity you are riding (horses)
1.8.9.1.0.2: Portable waypoint now has durability and multiple uses
1.8.9.1.0.3: Now protected from falling out of the world
1.8.9.1.0.4: Fix water spell making source water blocks correctly
1.8.9.1.0.5: Make the temporary fragile blocks un-harvestable even with silk touch
1.8.9.1.1.0: Replaced runestone items with passive spells directly on the wand based on type.  Add ingame config support, and option to change HUD from left to right
1.8.9.1.1.1: Fixed the mod crashing servers on startup
1.8.9.1.2.0: Add far-reach building spell and lightning bolt spell
1.8.9.1.3.0: Building spells now work at 64 range.  Add custom inventory inside the wand used by building spells.  Sounds and particles changed/added.
1.8.9.1.3.1: Regen is dynamic, starts slow and speeds up after not using wand for a while.
1.8.9.1.4.0: Change spell wand color and spell loadout.  Max energy is upgradeable
